DOC.brief_summary: The objective study explore safety tolerability multiple oral dos ASP015K healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics ASP015K
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects confine clinical research unit 19 day . Subjects receive follow-up phone call asses safety 1 5 day discharge study . Subjects receive study drug twice per day ( BID ) day 1 13 14 day treatment period , receive single dose study drug morning day 14 treatment period .
DOC.criteria: If female , subject least 2 year post menopausal surgically sterile per documentation provide third party medical professional subject pregnant document negative serum pregnancy test If male , subject agree sexual abstinence and/or use highly effective method birth control study period Subject medically healthy , clinically significant abnormality medical history abnormality observe upon physical examination 12 lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Subject 's fast clinical laboratory value within normal limit Subject nonsmoker light smoker ( < 10 cigarettes/day ) Subjects must weigh least 45 kg Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1832 kg/m2 Subject positive test hepatitis C antibody , positive hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Subject know positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody Subject history severe allergic anaphylactic reaction Subject history chronic diarrhea Subject vaccinate within last 60 day prior study drug administration Subject previous history clinically significant neurological , gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , pulmonary , metabolic , cardiovascular , psychiatric , endocrine , hematological disorder disease , medical condition , Investigator 's opinion , would preclude participation study Subject clinically significant illness within 1 month prior study drug administration Subject history hemorrhoid Subject positive guaiac test Subject history drug alcohol abuse , positive urine serum screen drug abuse/illegal drug , positive blood breathalyzer alcohol Subject treatment prescription medication ( except hormone replacement therapy acetaminophen ) , complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) within 14 day , overthecounter product within 1 week , alcohol , caffeine grapefruit juice within 24 hour prior study drug administration Subject treatment another investigational drug approve therapy investigational use within 30 day 10 halflives , whichever longer , prior study drug administration participate prior group current study Subject history blood donation within 30 day prior study drug administration donate plasma within 7 day prior study drug administration
